name: part_001
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The three participants, Shirogane Noel, Kazama Iroha, and Yuzuki Choco, visually inspect three different beef bowls. Noel also drinks a large mug of beer.
Choco blindfolds Noel and Iroha to prepare for the blind tasting challenge.
The participants taste the first beef bowl. Noel adds a lot of Yuzu Shichimi to hers.
The participants move on to tasting the second beef bowl and compare it to the first.

subtitles.original: 牛丼女王決定戦
subtitles.english: Gyudon Queen Decision Battle

subtitles.original: 見た目チェック中…
subtitles.english: Visual check in progress...

subtitles.original: いざ、の...
subtitles.english: Alright, so...

subtitles.original: 牛丼を見るのが本当に久しぶりすぎて
subtitles.english: It's really been a long time since I looked at beef bowls like this.

subtitles.original: あの、全部確かに違うけど
subtitles.english: Well, they definitely all look different, but...

subtitles.original: どれがいつも見たことある牛丼？って今なってるでござるな
subtitles.english: I'm wondering which one is the beef bowl I usually see.

subtitles.original: なるほどなるほど。そしたら真ん中の方の牛丼はいかがでしょう？
subtitles.english: I see, I see. Then, how about the beef bowl in the middle?

subtitles.original: 真ん中の。えっとこちらはあれなんですよ
subtitles.english: The middle one? Well, this one is...

subtitles.original: 玉ねぎが細かいですね
subtitles.english: The onions are cut quite small.

subtitles.original: そう、牛丼って結構玉ねぎがね、ちょっと大きめに切られてること多いんですけど、これはちょっと細かいということで
subtitles.english: Yeah, usually with beef bowls the onions are cut a bit larger, but these are small.

subtitles.original: そして肉が多い。つまり...
subtitles.english: And there's a lot of meat. In other words...

subtitles.original: あ、あ、わかりました、これは
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. This must be...

subtitles.original: なるほどね、お肉を売りにしてる、その分値段もみたいな感じなのかな
subtitles.english: I see, it's the type where they focus on meat quality, and the price reflects that.

subtitles.original: なるほどなるほど。しかもちょこ玉ねぎ嫌いなんで
subtitles.english: I see. Also, Choco hates onions.

subtitles.original: あー、玉ねぎ嫌いなのかもしれないね。これ、玉ねぎないもん、ほとんど
subtitles.english: Ah, maybe they really do hate onions. This one has almost none.

subtitles.original: はいはいはい、なるほど。そしたらね、一番左側の方の牛丼いかがでしょう？
subtitles.english: I see. In that case, how about the beef bowl on the far left?

subtitles.original: 左側。あー、え、これ玉ねぎいっぱいある！
subtitles.english: The left one? Oh, this one has lots of onions!

subtitles.original: いっぱい入ってる！
subtitles.english: There's so much in here!

subtitles.original: さっきのチョコ先生の理論から言うと、じゃあこっちが高級...
subtitles.english: Based on Choco-sensei's theory earlier, then this one is high-end...

subtitles.original: わかるでござる。匂い嗅いでもいいすか？
subtitles.english: I get it. Can I smell it too?

subtitles.original: 確かに匂い嗅ぎたい
subtitles.english: I definitely want to smell it too.

subtitles.original: いい匂い。あー、お腹空いてきた
subtitles.english: It smells good. Ah, I'm getting hungry.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、チョコ先生の匂いも嗅いでもいいよ？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, you can smell Choco-sensei too, you know?

subtitles.original: あ、チョコ先生の匂いも嗅いだ。ちょっと団長...
subtitles.english: Ah, I smelled Choco-sensei too. Wait, Danchou...

subtitles.original: あ、ちなみにちょっと手前にあるんで、ちょっと一杯いいすか？
subtitles.english: Ah, by the way, there's a drink right here, can I have a sip?

subtitles.original: おいおいおい、飲むんじゃないよ！これから実食って言われてるでござるよ！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey! Don't drink! We're about to start the tasting!

subtitles.original: このジョッキめちゃめちゃオシャレ。なんか見覚えがある人もいると思うんだけど
subtitles.english: This mug is so stylish. I think some of you might recognize it...

subtitles.original: これ団長がディアンドル衣装でよく飲んでるジョッキなんですけど
subtitles.english: This is the mug Danchou often uses when she's in her dirndl outfit.

subtitles.original: いいすか？一杯いっちゃって
subtitles.english: Is it okay? If I just take one gulp?

subtitles.original: プハッ！美味い！
subtitles.english: *Gulp* Pwah! Delicious!

subtitles.original: うわああああ！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaa!

subtitles.original: 味わかる前に飲んじゃって大丈夫ですか？ノエル様
subtitles.english: Are you okay drinking before you've even tasted the food, Noel-sama?

subtitles.original: 全然全然。むしろ景気づけの一杯だから全然
subtitles.english: I'm fine, totally fine! It's just a drink to liven things up!

subtitles.original: 余裕っすよ。任せて
subtitles.english: I've got this. Leave it to me!

subtitles.original: それではね、実食なんですが
subtitles.english: Alright then, time for the tasting...

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、目隠しをして食べていただこうと思います
subtitles.english: I'm going to have you both wear blindfolds while you eat.

subtitles.original: なるほど。それで見ためじゃわかんない、本当口でね
subtitles.english: I see. So we can't tell by looks, only by taste.

subtitles.original: はい。よいしょ。お、それでは、どうぞ
subtitles.english: Yes. There we go. Alright then, go ahead.

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと団長、あー、何も見えん、何も見えん
subtitles.english: Alright, Danchou's going in... Ah, I can't see anything at all!

subtitles.original: 本当。本当。はい、じゃあ。いろは様も
subtitles.english: Truly. Truly. Alright, now Iroha-sama too.

subtitles.original: はい、本当何も見えない。はい、では前の方に
subtitles.english: Yes, I really can't see a thing. Okay, step forward.

subtitles.original: はい。かわいい。ちょっとどこだ
subtitles.english: Yes. So cute! Wait, where is it?

subtitles.original: 実食中
subtitles.english: Tasting in progress

subtitles.original: それではね、一つ目の方食べさせいただきましょう。いただきます！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's have you try the first one. Let's eat!

subtitles.original: あらあらノエル様、そんな大きな口を開けて
subtitles.english: Oh my, Noel-sama, opening your mouth so wide!

subtitles.original: 美味いですね。ちょっと団長、牛丼食べる時にいつもかけてるマストアイテムがありまして
subtitles.english: This is good! By the way, I have a must-have item that I always use when I eat beef bowls.

subtitles.original: あら、何かしら？
subtitles.english: Oh, what would that be?

subtitles.original: 柚子七味なんですけど、ただ目隠ししてるから、ちょっと撒き散らしそう
subtitles.english: It's Yuzu Shichimi, but since I'm blindfolded, I might scatter it everywhere.

subtitles.original: えっと、あ、穴が...
subtitles.english: Wait, the shaker hole is...

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってくださいね。チョコが開けてあげるわ、穴ぐらい
subtitles.english: Hold on a second. Choco will open the hole for you.

subtitles.original: よし、はい。おー、見えないとこで手が動かされている
subtitles.english: There we go. Oh, someone's hands are moving where I can't see!

subtitles.original: かかってる？かかってるかな？はい。めっちゃいっぱいかかったわね
subtitles.english: Is it on? I wonder if it's on... Wow, a lot went on there!

subtitles.original: 違う罰ゲームみたいになってきた。じゃあ、ちょっといただきます
subtitles.english: This is starting to feel like a punishment game. Well, I'll take a bite.

subtitles.original: あ、やばい柚子七味の匂いが爽やか
subtitles.english: Ah, the refreshing scent of Yuzu Shichimi is amazing!

subtitles.original: あらあらあら。いろは様はどう？
subtitles.english: Oh my, oh my. How about you, Iroha-sama?

subtitles.original: んー、美味しい！
subtitles.english: Mmm, delicious!

subtitles.original: お味はどんな感じ？甘い？しょっぱい？
subtitles.english: How's the flavor? Sweet? Salty?

subtitles.original: え、なんだろう。でも、しょっぱくはない、甘だれみたいな味がするでござる
subtitles.english: Hmm, let's see. It's not salty, it tastes like a sweet sauce.

subtitles.original: おー。団長もさっきまで甘くて美味しかったんですけど、すごい辛いです
subtitles.english: Oh, it was sweet and tasty for me too a second ago, but now it's super spicy!

subtitles.original: 今、ありえないほどかけたもんね
subtitles.english: Well, you did put an unbelievable amount on just now.

subtitles.original: え、めっちゃ美味しい。お肉ってこんなに美味しかったんでござるな
subtitles.english: Wow, this is so good. I didn't know meat could be this delicious!

subtitles.original: はい。それではね、次の牛丼に移っていきましょうか
subtitles.english: Alright. Now then, let's move on to the next beef bowl.

subtitles.original: はい、それではお二方とも、二杯目よろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Okay, both of you, please try the second one.

subtitles.original: はい。じゃあどちらかと言うとさっぱり...
subtitles.english: Yes. If anything, this one is more refreshing...

subtitles.original: さっぱり系？
subtitles.english: A refreshing type?

subtitles.original: あらあら、そんな大きな口で、かき込んで。お肉いっぱいね
subtitles.english: Oh my, stuffing your mouth so wide! There's plenty of meat.

subtitles.original: 柔らかい？
subtitles.english: Is it soft?

subtitles.original: え、あ、でも待って、玉ねぎ入ってる、こっち
subtitles.english: Wait, oh, hold on, this one has onions in it.

subtitles.original: 玉ねぎ、玉ねぎあるかないかさっき近くでわからなかった...あ、本当だ
subtitles.english: Onions... I couldn't tell if there were onions when I looked closely... Oh, you're right.
